alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 20 at 5:25PM CST until November 20 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL RANKIN...NORTH CENTRAL HINDS AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 524 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Annandale, or near Gluckstadt, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Jackson, Madison, Ridgeland, Canton, and Gluckstadt around 530 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
